Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.1: Describe the essential aspects of plant growth and soil management relevant to turf and landscape management.
Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.2: Analyze, interpret and present quantitative information relative to turf and landscape management.
Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.3: Solve complex, controversial problems by analyzing the key issues involved, acquiring and assessing necessary information, and synthesizing that information into one or more alternative solutions.
